role: Junior Full Stack Web Developer/Project Manager/Event Planner
summary: Full Stack Web Application Developer with background in Business management and Entrepreneurship. With over 5 years of experience in the hospitality industry, I’ve been effectively and creatively problem solving to develop user friendly applications for small businesses.

education.description: A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

experience.goal: Plan, organize, and execute event logistics with Event Manager from initial stages of development, through on-site and event wrap-up.
experience.value: Made job of Event Sales Manager and Event Manager easier by filling the gap in-between.
contribution: Created a custom Kanban board, to keep track of all active events, in the first two weeks I joined the company.
Sales and booking rates increased 200% in a six-month period.

projects.name: Sushi Junai (Interactive Menu Web App)

description: Login, Register functionality & Users can save favorites.
Diners can add items to their order tracker, see the amount those items would've cost, and calculate tip.
A timer shows diners how long they have left in their limited all-you-can-eat dining time.
